'''Bedrock Editor v1.0.5''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on July 22, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/253|title=Release 1.0.5 (1.21.110.20)|website=GitHub|date=July 22, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-preview-1-21-110-20|Minecraft Preview 1.21.110.20|July 22, 2025|Jay Wells}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/38234446024333-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-110-20|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.110.20|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 22, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
* Updated Editor Structures to now be exported under the {{cd|/structures}} folder in the world's directory when an Editor world is exported.
* Updated tooltip API property of {{cd|IToggleGroupPropertyItemEntry}} to take {{cd|BasicTooltipContent}}.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug where the selection highlight used the wrong color after changing the theme.
* Fixed a bug that caused keybinding text to be narrated incorrectly.
